page.title: 20Housing:Fauldhouse Area
page.content: Most of the housing in {Fauldhouse}and {Longridge }is owned by the district council .The{oldest}of this housing would date from about 1939.It has been {recently renovated and had central heating and fitted kitchens installed. The last{council housing}to be built here would be about 15 years old.It takes the form of flats in blocks of four with two bedrooms,and {semi detached }with up to three or four bedrooms. About 10% of the housing is {private.}There are many old but renovated {detached cottages }some {detached }and{semi detached}houses. In the last fifteen years about a hundred new houses have been built. They are all bungalows and semi_detached . The cost of {private }houses ranges from Â£18,000 to Â£40,000.
